creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: hand-built, reduction fire; bits of glass embedded in clay with liquid silver applied on surface; oval shaped ceramic vessel with large opening at top; top lip is folded and crimped; area below lip is intentionally cracked, textured with brown, silver, grey, and orange glaze; vessel is otherwise yellowish tan with yellow, orange, grey streaks; interior glaze is bluish-grey with dark blue and brown streaks
title: Roko: D
